item.description:
Why come out for the Last Night of Dyke Night at Toast?

Because. We should support Kristen Porter...A person who has supported the LGBT community in making her going away party at Toast the biggest and best party every.

Over the years Kristen Porter (founder and owner of Dyke Night Productions) has been a great supporter of the Dyke March Committee as well as other LGBT causes. (She donates 25% of her profits from Dyke Night Productions to LGBT community causes.) to Please come out and help celebrate the ending of her Friday night residency at Toast Lounge.

It will be an extra special night. Kristen promises "food, performance and a little something special for the singles and the couples at the event, which is being planned in collaboration with the group Mad Femme Pride. The Dyke Night staff is also putting together a performance, which means partygoers can see the famously behind-the-scenes, introverted Porter take the stage for once. "We're working on some numbers," Porter confesses. "That's what I've been talked into."

Cost: $8 before 10pm, $5 after 10pm. 21+. Party starts at 9pm until 2am. (Toast stops letting people in at 12:30pm.) Get there early to avoid a line.

_______________

Below is the ad from the Dyke Nite site. Details are subject to change. Please see the Dyke Nite site for the most up-to-date info...
_______________

Join Us for Dyke Night's Last Night* at Toast Lounge
** The Good-bye Best Of Bash **

April 25th
8 pm- 10 pm Special Event

Featuring highlights from past events, chances to meet a single hottie, round of the newlywed game, tons of giveaways and prizes, yummy nibbles, and great performances-including acts from the Dyke Night staff!! Co-hosted by those fabulous femme party planners madFEMMEpride.

10 pm- 2 am Dance Party
21+, $8 before 10pm, $5 after 10 pm

** Come Early-Stay Late-Celebrate **

Prizes include:

Tickets to Uh Huh Her (featuring Leisha Haley of the L Word)

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Dyke Night's Last Night at Toast Lounge ** The Good-bye Best Of Bash **
